title: 不論是真是假，但說出真相
contents:
美國政府是反共，但不反華；中國人是反美，但他們移民美國；俄羅斯政府是反華，但不反共；中國人親俄，但沒有人移民俄羅斯。

The us government is anti-communist, not anti-china. The Chinese are anti-american, but they immigrate America. The Russian government is anti-china and not anti-communist. The Chinese are pro-russia, but they are not immigrating to Russia.
